name: Nightmare
description: You create a horrible nightmare in the mind of any sleeping creature in a 120 foot circle around you, inflicting 3d6 + MOVE ghost damage automatically. This move does not wake a sleeping creature.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
